posts.name: Mahima Motors
posts.description: It is Motor Bike Sales Website named Mahima Motors.The Location of Mahima Motors is Basuda Plaza,Nitun Konj, Pahartoli, Raozan ,Chittagong,This website is Focused on online sales of Motor Bike.User can visit this website but for purchasing user have to login or sign Up.User can See All motor bikes Which are collected are there by Clicking Explore Product button in the Top banner and User can see details of motor bike and can purchase by clicking purchase button.If an admin logs in, he/she will not see the options that a normal user sees. Insted an admin will see Manage All Orders, Add A Product, Make Admin, Manage Products Logout.An Admin is be able to make another user an admin. If an admin wants, he/she will be able to add a product on the add a product page.If a user is logged in, he/she will see another option on the header is called Dashboard and inside that dashboard a normal user (not an admin) will see options like pay,My Orders, Review, Logout

posts.name: Sejin's Parlour
posts.description: This is a full-stack website with email/password and Google authentication. Using this website, authenticated users can  appoint parlour service and administrators can manage others processing.Implemented a dashboard with different roles for admins and users where users can see only his/her all orders in the dashboard and can cancel his/her order and admin can see all orders of all users.Admin has the ability to manage orders and products by adding new products, canceling orders, editing products, and deleting products. For admin login email: admin@admin.com and password:123456

posts.name: Amazona

posts.name: Doctors Portal
posts.description: This is a full-stack website with email/password authentication.Only Authenticated users or patients can take appointment from this portal.In User Dashboard user can seen his appointment and can also delete.Users can give service review this this portal.In Admin dashboad admin cann manage all the functionalities.He can add doctor,manage appointment.

posts.name: Tour Pedia
posts.description: This is full stack website with email password authentication.any user can create a tour tip by login this website.anu user can likes tours and give comment about any tour.he also display the save category tour in the tour descriptiion pages.Implemented dashborad in this website.Authenticated users can see dashboard page and he can add tour,edit and delete tour which he created.To build this website we used Reactjs nNode Js mongodb Redux toolkit

posts.name: Emajhon App
posts.description: This is E-Commerce related website.An E-commerce company can manage its functionality by this website.The Fron end part of this website is designed bu using React js and The Back end part of this website is designed by using Node Js.As a database mongodb is used for string data.for user authentication firebase authentication ise used

posts.name: Deshi Restaurant
